title: <datalist>
description: The `<datalist>` HTML element contains a set of `<option>` elements that represent predefined options for other controls, such as `<input>` elements with a `list` attribute.
content: The element that provides a list of predefined options for an `<input>` element. When the user starts typing in the input field, the options in the `<datalist>` are filtered and displayed as a dropdown, allowing for easier selection.
